title: Mark Wahlberg left the Super Bowl early for a very understandable reason
text:
Mark Wahlberg and his family were among the many Patriots fans who flocked to Houston for Super Bowl 51. But the Dorchester native was not among the faithful who watched New England complete the greatest comeback in Super Bowl history.
Wahlberg was spotted leaving NRG Stadium with his wife, Rhea Durham, and children Michael and Brendan before the game was over.
